title: Cricket-Insight
description: A full-stack cricket analytics platform featuring automated web scraping, scalable MongoDB data pipelines, and AI-driven query handling for deep match insights. Delivered live score updates and instant notifications via WebSockets, boosting real-time accuracy and user engagement. Implemented optimized, fault-tolerant background processing with Celery and Redis, ensuring smooth data ingestion even during peak traffic.

title: Mention-Manager
description: Built a real-time Brand Monitoring System that tracks conversations about a brand across social media, news sites, and forums. The app automatically scrapes mentions, analyzes sentiment using AI (VADER), detects sudden spikes in activity, and sends instant alerts for negative trends. Interactive dashboards show mention volumes, sentiment breakdowns, platform-wise distribution, and long-term trends. The system runs on a Dockerized setup with a FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend for quick deployment and smooth real-time monitoring.

title: Movie-Recomendation
description: Built a movie recommendation web app using Python. The system ingests movie metadata and user-rating data to generate personalized movie suggestions. It handles data storage, serves recommendations via a web interface, and supports features like movie poster fetching and metadata lookup. The architecture includes backend services (data processing, recommendation logic), a frontend template-driven UI, and integration for movie details and poster retrieval for better user experience.

title: Bulk-Flow
description: BulkFlow is a full-stack product management system built for handling large-scale data with ease. It supports full CRUD operations, lightning-fast bulk CSV imports with real-time progress tracking, and an interactive analytics dashboard for instant insights. The platform includes a flexible webhook engine that triggers events on product changes, plus a modern responsive UI with light/dark themes and live updates for a smooth, real-time user experience.

title: PyMind – AI-Powered Assistant
description: AI chat app using Chainlit + Gemini for real-time Python code help. Features file upload, chat history with TinyDB, and command-based UI.

title: pyide-egsd – Online Python IDE
description: Online Python IDE similar to online-python.com. CodeMirror frontend + Docker backend with I/O via subprocess for real-time code execution.

title: TrainTransit
description: Train info app using Flask and MongoDB that shows routes and schedules. Clean UI with Bootstrap and deployed online for easy access.
